# SimpleConsoleLogger.IsEnabled Method

**Declaring Type:** [SimpleConsoleLogger](../index.md)

Checks if the given `logLevel` is enabled.

```csharp
public bool IsEnabled(LogLevel logLevel);
```

## Parameters

`logLevel`  LogLevel

level to be checked.

## Returns

bool

`true` if enabled.
